thread.title: Melissa Ben-Ishay on the Recipe for Entrepreneurial Success

author: wsjcom
title: Melissa Ben-Ishay on the Recipe for Entrepreneurial Success
text:
You can do anything you set your mind to, says Melissa Ben-Ishay, founder of mini cupcake company Baked by Melissa.
That’s the message Ms. Ben-Ishay’s father stressed to her when she was young, and it’s the message she gives women who ask her secret to becoming a successful entrepreneur.
In this week’s Secrets of Wealthy Women podcast with... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
